title: Colonial Williamsburg font ID
content:
Hi. Does anyone know what this fancy script font is? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108222326im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Colonial%20Williamsburg%20font_4796.jpg)
author: abernath

comments.content:
Hey Maggie

This is a proprietary font designed for Colonial Williamsburg. It was extrapolated, in its entirety, from the words Colonial Williamsburg (the logo had been around for many decades).

Michael
